title: Origin Stories: Geraint Thomas on His First Contract – ‘Barloworld and the Italians Telling Me I Needed to Lose Weight’
content:
The Welsh rider remains the only British-born Tour de France winner and it all started on an outdoor velodrome in Cardiff: 'I started to win a lot, and I thought, that’s it, then.'

Read the full article at Origin Stories: Geraint Thomas on His First Contract – ‘Barloworld and the Italians Telling Me I Needed to Lose Weight’ on Velo.
author: ahood
